withElectralink.title: Your last months of electricity usage

pricesComparisonTable.footer: * The prices are calculated based on your electricity usage of 35.000 kWh/year and contract renewal with your current provider. The new prices include a commission for Watt.co.uk of 1p / unit

errors.existentAccount: Changes could not be saved because the account already exists.

page.title: FURTHER ACTION REQUIRED
page.subtext1: Unfortunately our comparison engine is not generating any quotes for your meter. This could be due to a number of reasons such as Industry type, and unsupported meter or large usage.
page.subtitle2: You may need a more tailored energy quote.
page.subtext2: Our trusted adviser will be in touch to talk you through alternative options as it may just mean we need to obtain a more bespoke price from the suppliers to suit your needs.
page.subtext3: We will find you a competitive quote to suit your business needs and call you right back.
page.bottomTitle: Alternatively, give us a call on
page.proceed: Please proceed to the next utility.

authorized.label: I confirm I am authorized to deal with this company's account.

creditCheck.label: I agree to a credit check being carried out on this company.

letterOfAuthority.label: I agree with signing the Letter of Authority to allow Watt.co.uk to act on my behalf within the industry and with my current supplier. The LOA is valid for 30 days of signing, unless a contract is signed at which point the LOA length will reflect the length of the contract.
